short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: It provides user valuable weekly content, tool and resources and useful links about Jiujitsu made by coach Brian Debes.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Brazilian Jiujitsu Beaumont will guide the user though a basic curriculum of learning Jiujitsu.  It does this by displaying the current video inside the extension every week and notifying the user when the video is changed every week.  It also provides a tab with links to useful resources.
